reviewText: Pleased to get the two at a reasonable price.
I enjoy the two movies, but the movie blown away had problems playing due to CD issues.
Good movies. Great for our collection.

My husband and I saw this movie years ago and we really liked it. I found it on Amazon and knew we wanted a copy of it. "Blown Away" is a great action movie. I have not watched "The Killer Elite" yet.

the item that I had purchased above was the two movies on one dvd of blown away 1990 and sam peckingpah 's 1975 classic the killer elite was shipped and delivered right on time with no problems. the dvd itself was in excellent shape as described by the seller  with no scratches or cracks. the dvd played great in my dvd player. the case itself also was in great shape with no rips or cracked areas in all a great purchase. thank you so very much for the purchase I have made. it was a pleasure doing business with you and look forward to do more business with you again real soon.
I Just Love Susan Haywood as an Actress,I think she's one of the best of all times,but this would be the worse movie I have ever seen her in. But as they say EACH TO THEIR OWN
